title: About Me
text:
I am 21 years of age, I really enjoy hands on R&D projects, extremely interested in the betterment of the environment and anything to do in the robotics environment.
I am not sure if I want to go to graduate school for a masters after my bachelors or if I want to go straight into the industry for a few years and then have the possibility to have a job pay for my masters.
My hobbies include video editing, playing video games, free running whenever I have the chance, and working out at the gym. Since I am training for running again, I do have a hope of completing a marathon at some point in my life but I will probably start out with smaller 5kâ€™s or half marathons.

title: Travis Anger - Mechatronics Engineer
text: I am a third year Mechatronics major expecting to graduate in the spring of 2024. My major consists of classes in Computer Science, Electronics, Mechanical Engineering, Mathematics, Physics and Robotics. I am also starting a minor in Computer Science.

title: Undergraduate Research
text:
Current:
I am working under Professor Vida Vakillian, one of the Department Heads of Mechatronics at CSUCI, and the research I am doing is obtaining a better knowledge of Programmable Logic Controllers (PLC).
So far I have learned:
Micro 820 controller with CCW
CompactLogix Controller 1769-LI18ER-BB1B with Studio5000
